title: Police Terrorize a Family in Phoenix & George Stephanopoulos Interviews Trump | Christine Lagarde
itunes:title: Police Terrorize a Family in Phoenix & George Stephanopoulos Interviews Trump | Christine Lagarde
description:
Phoenix cops spark outrage for threatening a family, George Stephanopoulos interviews President Trump, and Trevor talks to the managing director of the IMF, Christine Lagarde. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
